part_description: Consists of a curved blade with three stacked layers, each layer slightly smaller, positioned along the spine of the blade.
internal_interaction_description: The three layers of the blade are stacked in a way that creates a stepped effect, enhancing the structural integrity and aesthetic appeal. Each layer aligns perfectly with the curvature of the blade, providing a consistent thickness and strength throughout the length.
external_interaction_description: The knife blade is designed to interact with various materials, providing effective cutting or slicing capabilities. Its layered structure may offer improved durability and precision. The curvature aids in rocking motions during cutting, making it suitable for culinary uses or crafting tasks.
